ConceptDef.label: Special: Power Weapons
ConceptDef.helpText: Power Weapons give off a blue glow and ingnore all mundane armour while active.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Force Weapons
ConceptDef.helpText: Force Weapons possess the ability to channel the users psychic talents into a potent melee attack, which is capable of incapacitating or killing the target instantly.(this only functions when weilded by a pawn with either Psychicly sensitivitive or Psychicly hypersensitivitive traits) and give off a purple glow while active.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Pacifiers
ConceptDef.helpText: Pacifiers possess though various means, excel at subduing their opponents in a (Ususally) Non Lethal manner. Current types are either Psychic or Pain based

ConceptDef.label: Special: Irradiated Munitions
ConceptDef.helpText: Wounds caused by Irradiated Munitions cause radiation poisoning untill tended.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Weapon Jam
ConceptDef.helpText: Some weapons have a chance to jam while firing, damaging the weapon, the better qaulity and condition, the less likely it is to jam.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Gets Hot
ConceptDef.helpText: Some weapons have a chance to overheat while firing, causing injury to the user, damaging the weapon and potentially exploding, the better qaulity and condition, the less likely it is to jam.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Vortex Weapons
ConceptDef.helpText: Vortex weapons cause tears in the fabric of reality, to the warp, anything unfortuneate enough to be hit by such a weapon risks being flung into the warp, if not torn to shreds by the forces involved.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Baleful Energies
ConceptDef.helpText: The baleful energies channeled by utilizing Necron weaponry are hazardous to biological beings, and have been known to eat through armour as if it wasnt there.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Rapid Fire
ConceptDef.helpText: Rapid fire weapons have an increased Rate of fire, their warmup/cooldown cycle is halfed when firing at targets are within half of their max range.

ConceptDef.label: Special: Rapid Fire
ConceptDef.helpText: Rapid fire weapons have an increased Rate of fire, their warmup/cooldown cycle is halfed when firing at targets are within half of their max range.

ConceptDef.label: Shield belts
ConceptDef.helpText: Shield belts stop ranged attacks from coming in or out. They have no effect on melee attacks.\n\nTo fight against shield belts, either concentrate a lot of gunfire on the target, or fight hand-to-hand.
